page.title: 10Education
page.content: {PLAYGROUP: }The Canonbie play group meets in the village hall. The usual age for children to start playgroup is 3 or 4. Not all children in the area go to playgroup. {PRIMARY SCHOOL:} All children in the area go either to Glenzier or Canonbie primary school at the age of five. The school at Canonbie had 64 pupils in 1985 and three permanent teachers.A gym teacher and an art teacher come once a week. {SECONDARY SCHOOL: }At the age of twelve the children move to a secondary school, usually Langholm Academy.At age 16 they must travel to Lockerbie or Annan if they want 16+ education as Langholm Academy is not large enough to supply a full range of courses. This may mean up to 47 miles of daily travel for children taking highers.
